name: Wait For It ...
description:
Game Story

As an advanced vampire you can resist the sun light
However you still need to feed
Thankfully there's a lot of people in this small town
But town's knight won't allow murderers to walk free

Control
  • A and D to move
  • W to hide behind tree
Credit Graphic
